DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate performance acceptance Optive versus Hylocomod eyedrops , administer one month patient mild moderate dry eye symptom , without contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: Performance Acceptance Optive Versus Hylocomod Eyedrops Patients With Dry Eye Symptoms
DOC.criteria: 18 year Contact lens wearer , spectacle wearer nonspectacle wearer Mild severe dry eye symptom , define OSDI score 13 100 Mild moderate conjunctival stain eye and/or mild moderate corneal stain eye Best correct visual acuity 6/9 eye Previously use Hylocomod Optive eyedrops Systemic allergy eye allergy Systemic disease might ocular component and/or interfere contact lens wear Autoimmune disease might ocular component and/or interfere contact lens wear Systemic medication might eye side effect interfere contact lens wear Eye infection use eye medication
